resources.string: This is not an usual downhill skateboard event. The road is also called \"Road of The Kings\" ,so you should prove that you are one of them . The riding here is till the wasteness,the weather is one of the wildest and you have to get over the first 5 days of riding, healthy and in one piece, to be able to take part at the most craziest downhill run and beat the actual King: \"The King of Transalpina\"
